mapper.select: SELECT * FROM atai_user_competition WHERE user_id=#{userId} AND compentition_id=#{compentitionId}
mapper.update: UPDATE atai_user_competition SET score=#{score},deadline=#{date} WHERE user_id=#{userId} AND compentition_id=#{compentitionId}
UPDATE atai_user_competition SET is_deleted=1 WHERE user_id=#{userId} AND compentition_id=#{compentitionId}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM atai_user_competition WHERE team_id=#{teamId} AND compentition_id=#{compentitionId}
SELECT team_name,score,deadline FROM atai_user_competition WHERE compentition_id=#{compentitionId} ORDER BY score DESC;

SELECT auc.compentition_id AS id,auc.team_id,auc.score,auc.team_name, ac.`name`,ac.`level`,ac.`participants`,ac.`deadline`,ac.`money` FROM `atai_user_competition` auc,atai_competition ac WHERE auc.`compentition_id`=ac.`id` AND auc.user_id=#{userId}
